title: The Role of the Coach
creator_credit: John Dick, Bruce Moir, South Australian Film Corporation and Bosisto Productions
brief_description: A training film to be used as a discussion starter in the development of new and practising coaches. Emphasises the aims of coaching, the different styles of coaching and individual reasons for involvement.
creator_credit_for_label: John Dick, Bruce Moir, South Australian Film Corporation and Bosisto Productions
